title: Replace green brand color with Medical Blue (site-wide)

requirements.text: Update the global theme so that any UI currently using the Jeevan green/teal brand color is rendered in Medical Blue instead, across all pages and dashboards.

quotes: change the green colour in to Medical Blue

acceptanceCriteria: All UI elements that previously rendered in the Jeevan teal/green (including `--jeevan-teal`, `--secondary`, and `--accent`) now render in Medical Blue in light mode.
All UI elements that previously rendered in the Jeevan teal/green now render in Medical Blue in dark mode.
There are no remaining noticeable green/teal accents in buttons, badges, icons, links hover states, or highlights across public pages and admin/doctor/phlebotomist sections.

requirements.text: Ensure Tailwind theme tokens and utilities remain consistent after the color change by updating the CSS variables used by Tailwind (e.g., `--secondary`, `--accent`, related chart tokens) so charts/badges/status elements no longer use green.

quotes: change the green colour in to Medical Blue

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/index.css` theme variables are updated so secondary/accent and any chart colors that referenced the green/teal value no longer resolve to green.

All existing Tailwind classes (e.g., `text-jeevan-teal`, `bg-jeevan-teal`, `hover:text-jeevan-teal`, `hover:bg-jeevan-teal`) now visually display as Medical Blue without needing to edit immutable UI component sources.
No contrast/accessibility regressions are introduced (text remains readable on Medical Blue backgrounds and hover states).

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only).
Do not modify the Internet Identity hooks or other files listed under `frontend.immutablePaths`.
No backend changes are required for this branding-only update.
nonGoals: Adding new features or changing booking/CRM/business logic.
Changing the logo asset or other brand imagery (only color theme update).
